oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Strobridge and Co. Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Mardi Gras; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Strobridge & Co., Cincinnati, OH to Colton Greene: acknowledges receipt of Greene's order and will send samples and price list; offers to print from original design if Greene furnishes a copy of sketch.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
